sentences.en: A miasma rose from the marsh.
sentences.cn: 沼泽地里冒出了瘴气.

sentences.en: A posse of Marsh's friends persuaded them that this was a bad idea.
sentences.cn: 马什的一群朋友劝他们说这是个馊主意。

sentences.en: At her London Hotel today Miss Marsh told reporters she might retire.
sentences.cn: 今天在伦敦旅馆,马什小姐告诉记者她可能要退休.

sentences.en: Cows were grazing on the marshes.
sentences.cn: 牛群在湿地上吃草。

sentences.en: Doesn't Karen Marsh look old!
sentences.cn: 卡伦看上去不显老嘛!

sentences.en: He led them away from a marsh.
sentences.cn: 他把他们带离沼泽。

sentences.en: It was like my own marsh country, flat and monotonous.
sentences.cn: 这地方很象我故乡的沼地,景色单调, 索然无趣.

sentences.en: Juror No. 10 , Richard Marsh , was for Cowperwood in a sentimental way.
sentences.cn: 第十位陪审员理查·马希, 是对柯帕乌有同情之感而袒护她的.

sentences.en: Long strips of glazing set vertically into white frames face out into the marsh landscape of the site.
sentences.cn: 曲线形的立面朝向基地的湿地，其垂直的白色框架间镶嵌着长条的玻璃窗。

sentences.en: My urine and excrement are recycled by a system of ducts, pipes, wires, plants, and marsh-microbes, and redeemed into water and food which I can eat.
sentences.cn: 由众多的导管、管线、植物和沼泽微生物构成的系统回收了我的尿液和粪便，并将其还原成水和食物供我食用。

sentences.en: She recognized the country more precisely, the desolate marsh and the sea.
sentences.cn: 她对乡村景色的辩认更细致入微了, 她看见了那片荒凉的沼泽地和海.

sentences.en: The air, too, smelt more freshly than down beside the marsh.
sentences.cn: 这里的空气也比下面沼泽地旁清新多了.

sentences.en: The country is made up of meadow and marsh.
sentences.cn: 那地区全是草地和沼泽.

sentences.en: The little boy was sucked into the marsh.
sentences.cn: 那个小男孩被沼泽地吞没了.

sentences.en: There are a lot of frogs in the marsh.
sentences.cn: 沼泽里有许多青蛙.

sentences.en: There was the solitary flat marsh on the shore.
sentences.cn: 岸上是一片荒凉萧索的沼地.

sentences.en: They made their way slowly out of the marsh.
sentences.cn: 他们慢慢地走出了沼泽地.

sentences.en: They sometimes sank knee-deep into the marsh.
sentences.cn: 他们不时陷入没膝的湿地。

sentences.en: To the one side of the mountain is the boundless and melancholy marsh.
sentences.cn: 山那边是泥泽,死气沉沉,一望无垠.

sentences.en: We gonna mosh through the marsh, take us right through the doors.
sentences.cn: 我们要在这沼泽中前进， 使我们的权利通过这些门。

words.tran_cn: [地理]沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的

trans.tran_cn: 沼泽的；生长在沼泽地的

trans.tran_en: an area of low flat ground that is always wet and soft
